title: M'eza (preview for an interactive installation)
creator_contributor_role: Advanced Diploma of Multimedia (ADoM), Swinburne University of Technology (formerly Electronic Design and Interactive Media (EDIM), production company
abstract: A short linear representation of an installed art piece
description: As part of the end of year screening for the Swinburne, EDIM (Electronic Design and Interactive Media) course - those students who had completed interactive coursework were required to create a linear representation of their work for the showreel. M'eza is an immersive art-piece screened at Videobrasil Electronic Art festival 2003. Artist should be contacted at a later date for a further explanation of the work
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1005723; Swinburne EDIM Graduate Screening 2002 - Pixel-pusher; Active; 2002
